title: S5 Ep5: Macro-financial policies in an international financial centre
itunes:title: Macro-financial policies in an international financial centre
description: Since the GFC the UK has used innovative macroprudential and monetary policy tools to maintain stability. But the UK is an international financial centre, and so does this policy framework create spillovers in other places, and do influences from elsewhere affect stability in the UK? Yes and yes, says Thorsten Beck.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
